title: Culturally Integrated Instructional Design for Enhancing Multicultural Competence

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Multicultural Society and Online Learning Tool Usage Experience
context.additional_context: Project-Based Learning Aims to Cultivate Competencies for Effective Collaboration and Problem-Solving in Multicultural Settings, with Learners Designing and Evaluating Intercultural Communication Strategies

learning_goals: Cultivate the ability to analyze diverse cultural perspectives and integrate them into instructional design
Design educational programs reflecting multicultural learners' needs according to a cultural integration model
Develop educational content prototypes considering intercultural differences using collaborative platforms
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
